EmailTemplate.name: Event - Accelerate 2015.Email - Invite 3 - from Sales - EN - (webinar format) -
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now for Tricentis Accelerate 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=sales>
Accelerate 2015 October 22nd, 2015 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m. Vienna, Austria
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We would like to invite you to Tricentis Accelerate 2015 <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=sales>. Join us for an inspiring day full of seminars, workshops, and networking.
You can also now find the our preliminary program <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=sales> online.
Register now <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=sales> to secure your free ticket.
We look forward to meeting you in Vienna.
Best regards,
The Tricentis Events Team
PS: Highlights from Accelerate 2014 can be found here <http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate/accelerate-2014/>.
<http://www.tricentis.com/events-webinars/tricentis-accelerate?utm_medium=email&utm_source=sales> Thu, Oct 22, 2015 9:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m.
